text.p: Compass Bancshares Inc said Wednesday it has acquired Horizon Bancorp Inc under a previously announced stock deal.

Compass, a bank holding company based here and with 219 oiffices in Alabama, Florida and Texas, said the acquisition gives it presence in Texas' four largest markets. Compass has $11.8 billion in assets.
In addition, it said it will have access to east Texas and cities along the Interstate 35 corridor from Dallas to San Antonio.
Horizon, the parent of Austin, Texas,-based Horizon Bank & Trust, has $162 million in assets and $150 million in deposits. It brings in eight locations to Compass' franchise in Texas.
Compass said that when other pending acquisitions and new constructions are completed, it will operate 105 bank offices and have more than $5.1 billion in assets throughout Texas.
